resources.string: The Mobile Awareness GEOINT Environment, or MAGE, provides mobile situational awareness capabilities. The MAGE app on your mobile device allows you to create geotagged field reports that contain media such as photos, videos, and voice recordings and share them instantly with who you want. Using the GPS in your mobile device, MAGE can also track users locations in real time. Your locations can be automatically shared with the other members of your team.\n\nThe app remains functional if your mobile device loses its network connection, and will upload its local content when a connection is re-established. When disconnected from the network, MAGE will use local data layers to continue to provide relevant GEOINT. Data layers, including map tiles and vector data, can be stored on your mobile device and are available at all times.
Do you want to remove this attachment from the observation?
Your device has been registered. \nAn administrator has been notified to approve this device.
Do you want to discard your changes?
Do not filter observations on time.
Do not filter locations on time.
You were logged in as %s, and your MAGE session has expired. Please login to resume using MAGE.
Click to configure GPS sensitivy and tracking options
MAGE location services have been disabled. Click here to go to settings and enabled the location permission

string.name: location_no_event_title
string.font: Not a member of this event

resources.string: You are an administrator and not a member of the current event. You can not create an observation in this event.
The device has not received a location yet. To make an observation manually, long press on the map.
MAGE shares your location with the team, and enables you to add observations at your current position

MAGE has been denied access to location services. To create an observation at your current location please go into your devices settings and enable the Location permission, otherwise long press on the map.
MAGE is looking for offline maps that may reside in external storage on your device. Please allow MAGE to access external media to view this map.
MAGE has been denied access to external storage. To access map caches that reside in external storage please go into the MAGE application settings on your device and enable the Storage permission.
MAGE has been denied access to the camera or external storage. To create attachments please go into the MAGE application settings on your device and enable the Camera and Storage permissions.
MAGE has been denied access to the microphone or external storage. To create attachments please go into the MAGE application settings on your device and enable the Microphone permission.
MAGE has been denied access to external storage. To pick media from the Gallery please go into the MAGE application settings on your device and enable the Storage permission.
MAGE has been denied access to external storage. To save media from MAGE please go into the MAGE application settings on your device and enable the Storage permission.
MAGE has been denied access to read external storage. Please enable if you would like access to offline layers that reside in external storage.
Event administrators can add layers to your event, or can be shared from other applications.
You are about to delete the selected data and logout.\n\n Are you sure you want to do this?
Event administrators can add layers to your event.
Do you want to delete this point?\n%1$s, %2$s
Change shape to a single point?\n%1$s, %2$s
Change to a shape encompassing rectangle?
Long click point to adjust corner
Long click map or point to draw rectangle
Drag and release to adjust corner
Long click map to insert point between nearest points
Long click map to add next point
Drag and release to adjust location
Line must have at least two points
Polygon must have at least three points
